VOS
Voluntary Observing Ships Metocean Data
Date range : from 1662 till present
Number of records : > 7.25 million
Area : 10 N - 80 S, 30 W - 70 E

The following extractions are allowed on-line:
(total no of degree blocks) * (no of years) <= 10, e.g.
1 degree and 10 years or 2 x 2 degrees and 2 years or 3 x 3 degrees and 1 year
For any other extraction size an off-line request will be submitted on your behalf

Enter latitude (N/S) and longitude (E/W) limits in decimal degrees
